Topic.Title: changing the desktop editor default settings?

Posts.EditableText:
Is there a way to set some file path preferences with the desktop editor? I would like to have it either follow the last directory I had open, or allow me to set the directory to look in.

The reason:

I'm adding images to all my rooms (50 so far and a lot more to come), and I have them all in a specific directory. But every time I add an image, it wants to open the documents directory. Granted, the game is saving to that directory, and it's copying the images in there - which is fine - but that's not where I want to load from (and I'm getting tired of having to change directories every single time)
